languages.text: "Тебе хочется крови и боли? Я дам тебе крови и боли. Вспомни, как мы с тобой повеселились в Комморре. Я дам тебе все это — еще больше".

traits.locale_text: "Тебе хочется крови и боли? Я дам тебе крови и боли. Вспомни, как мы с тобой повеселились в Комморре. Я дам тебе все это — еще больше".

languages.text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."
languages.original_text: "Тебе хочется крови и боли? Я дам тебе крови и боли. Вспомни, как мы с тобой повеселились в Комморре. Я дам тебе все это — еще больше".

traits.locale_text: "You crave blood and pain? You will have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."
"You crave blood and pain? You will have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."
"You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."
"You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."
"You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

languages.text: « Vous vous nourrissez du sang et de la douleur ? Vous aurez les deux en abondance. N'oubliez jamais nos exploits communs à Commorragh. Je vous donnerai tout cela, et bien plus encore. »
languages.original_text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous nourrissez du sang et de la douleur ? Vous aurez les deux en abondance. N'oubliez jamais nos exploits communs à Commorragh. Je vous donnerai tout cela, et bien plus encore. »

languages.text: 「血と苦痛が欲しいのか？どちらも受けとることになるだろう。コモラフで共に過ごした輝かしい時を覚えているか？あれに勝るのものを与えてやろう」
languages.original_text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

traits.locale_text: 「血と苦痛が欲しいのか？どちらも受けとることになるだろう。コモラフで共に過ごした輝かしい時を覚えているか？あれに勝るのものを与えてやろう」

languages.text: “你渴望鲜血和痛苦吗？我都可以给你。还记得咱们在科摩罗享受的美好时光吗？那一切我都可以给你，甚至更多。”
languages.original_text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

traits.locale_text: “你渴望鲜血和痛苦吗？我都可以给你。还记得咱们在科摩罗享受的美好时光吗？那一切我都可以给你，甚至更多。”

languages.text: "Ihr giert nach Blut und Schmerz? Dann sollt Ihr beides bekommen. Denkt an unsere glorreichen gemeinsamen Zeiten in Commorragh. Ich gebe Euch all das und mehr."
languages.original_text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr giert nach Blut und Schmerz? Dann sollt Ihr beides bekommen. Denkt an unsere glorreichen gemeinsamen Zeiten in Commorragh. Ich gebe Euch all das und mehr."

languages.text: «¿Ansías sangre y dolor? Tendrás los dos. Recuerda la gloriosa experiencia que vivimos juntos en Commorragh. Te concederé eso y mucho más».
languages.original_text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ansías sangre y dolor? Tendrás los dos. Recuerda la gloriosa experiencia que vivimos juntos en Commorragh. Te concederé eso y mucho más».

languages.text: "Kan ve acı mı arzuluyorsun? İkisinden de mahrum kalmayacaksın. Commorragh'ta geçirdiğimiz harikulade zamanları hatırla. Çok daha fazlasını sunacağım."
languages.original_text: "You crave blood and pain? You shall have both. Remember the glorious time we had together in Commorragh. I will give you all of that and more."

traits.locale_text: "Kan ve acı mı arzuluyorsun? İkisinden de mahrum kalmayacaksın. Commorragh'ta geçirdiğimiz harikulade zamanları hatırla. Sana istemediğin kadar tedarik edeceğim."
